author: dap-jobandesther
body: I'm trying to download the powershell-6.0.0-beta.6-osx.10.12-x64.pkg, but the download speed is less than 10KB/s. I tried the speed test and I have 23.8 Mbps download speed. Am I the only one experiencing this?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I can download the package in 3 seconds.

comments.author: dap-jobandesther
comments.body: I see, I'll close this instead.

title: Very slow download of a 50.9 MB installer
